00014 void reqInit( struct Client* client )
00015 {
00016         struct Request* req = &client->request;
00017 
00018         req->method = NONE;
00019         req->httpVersion = HTTP_11;
00020         
00021         req->filename = NULL;
00022         req->systemFilename = dstInitCString("");
00023 }
00024 
00025 
00026 void reqDel( struct Client* client )
00027 {
00028         dstDel( client->request.filename );
00029         dstDel( client->request.systemFilename );
00030 }

00032 
00033 int reqParse( struct Client* client )
00034 {
00035         struct Request* req = &client->request;
00036         struct Buffer* buf = &client->buffer;
00037 
00038         char* str;
00039         for ( int i = 0; i < buf->line; ++i ) {
00040                 if( ( str = dstTok( buf->data[i], " \t" ) ) ) {
00041                         switch( reqGetKeyword( str ) ) {
00042                                 case GET:
00043                                         req->method = GET;
00044                                         req->filename = dstInitCString2( dstTok( buf->data[i], " \t" ) );
00045                                         if ( !strcmp( "HTTP/1.0", dstTok( buf->data[i], " \t" ) ) ) {
00046                                                 req->httpVersion = HTTP_10;
00047                                                 req->connection = CLOSE;
00048                                         } else {
00049                                                 req->httpVersion = HTTP_11;
00050                                                 req->connection = KEEP_ALIVE;
00051                                         }
00052                                         
00053                                         break;
00054                                 case CONNECTION:
00055                                         if ( !strcmp( dstTok( buf->data[i], " \t" ), "Keep-Alive" ) ) {
00056                                                 req->connection = KEEP_ALIVE;
00057                                         }
00058                         }
00059                 }
00060         }
00061 
00062         if ( req->method != NONE &&  req->filename && req->filename->length ) {
00063                 reqCalcRealFilename( client );
00064                 response( client );
00065                 return 1;
00066         }
00067         
00068         return 0;
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 
00073 enum Keyword reqGetKeyword( char* key )
00074 {
00075         if( !strcmp( key, "GET" ) ) {
00076                 return GET;
00077         }
00078         if ( !strcmp( key, "POST" ) ) {
00079                 return POST;
00080         }
00081         if ( !strcmp( key, "HEAD" ) ) {
00082                 return HEAD;
00083         }
00084         if ( !strcmp( key, "TRACE" ) ) {
00085                 return TRACE;
00086         }
00087         if ( !strcmp( key, "ACCEPT_ENCODING:" ) ) {
00088                 return ACCEPT_ENCODING;
00089         }
00090         if ( !strcmp( key, "Connection:" ) ) {
00091                 return CONNECTION;
00092         }
00093 
00094         return NONE;
00095 }

00097 
00098 void reqTestCompletness( struct Client* client )
00099 {
00100         struct Buffer* buffer = &client->buffer;
00101         
00102         if ( buffer->line > 0 ) {
00103                 if ( !buffer->data[buffer->line-1]->length ) {
00104                         if ( !client->completeRequest ) {
00105                                 client->completeRequest = 1;
00106 
00107                                 if ( reqParse( client ) ) {
00108                                         bufReset( buffer );
00109                                         return;
00110                                 } else { /* Error while parsing.. no complete request! */
00111                                         client->completeRequest = 0;
00112                                 }
00113                         }
00114                 }
00115         }
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 void reqCalcRealFilename( struct Client* client )
00120 {
00121         struct Request* req = &client->request;
00122         
00123         dstDel( req->systemFilename );
00124         
00125         req->systemFilename = dstInit( settings.path );
00126         dstAppend( req->systemFilename, req->filename->str );
00127         
00128         /* Test if itsdirectory */
00129         struct stat stBuf;
00130         int status = stat( req->systemFilename->str, &stBuf );
00131         if ( !status && S_ISDIR( stBuf.st_mode ) ) {
00132                 /* If its end without a '/', then redirect! */
00133                 if ( dstGetLastChar( req->systemFilename ) != '/' ) {
00134                         client->response.redirect = 1;
00135                         dstAppend( req->systemFilename, "/" );
00136                 }
00137                 
00138                 dstAppend( req->systemFilename, settings.standardfile );
00139         }
00140         
00141 }
00142 
00143 
00144 const char* reqGetFileType( struct Request* req )
00145 {
00146         const char* tmp = req->systemFilename->str;
00147         char* str = strrchr( tmp, '.' );
00148         if ( str ) {
00149                 return str + 1;
00150         }
00151 
00152         return 0;
00153 }
